labels.analysis: The MCP Server "Browserbase" provides cloud-based browser automation capabilities, allowing users to interact with web pages programmatically. Core functionalities include navigating web pages, clicking elements, filling out forms, extracting text, and taking screenshots. It is designed to enhance AI applications that require web interaction and data extraction without relying on a local browser instance. The tools provided are primarily focused on automating browsing tasks and collecting web-based data.
labels.reasoning: The primary functionality of this server is closely aligned with browser automation and web interaction. Given the tools available, it excels at simulating user actions on web pages and extracting data. The predefined "Browser Automation" category best represents this core capability. Additionally, since the server is tailored for data extraction, it also fits into the "Web Search & Research" category as a secondary label due to its potential use in gathering web-based information. No custom label is needed as the predefined categories sufficiently cover its functionality.

server_info_crawled.name: Browserbase MCP Server
server_info_crawled.author: @miyuren/mcp-server-browserbase
server_info_crawled.overview: Automate web browsing and data extraction seamlessly with our cloud browser capabilities. Interact with web pages, capture screenshots, and execute JavaScript effortlessly in a secure environment. Enhance your AI applications with powerful browser automation tools.

tools.name: browserbase_create_session
tools.description: Deploy Server Browserbase MCP Server @miyuren/mcp-server-browserbase Try in Playground browserbase_create_session

tools.name: browserbase_screenshot
tools.description: Takes a screenshot of the current page. Use this tool to learn where you are on the page when controlling the browser with Stagehand. Only use this tool when the other tools are not sufficient to get the information you need.

tools.name: browserbase_click
tools.description: Click an element on the page

tools.name: browserbase_get_text
tools.description: Extract all text content from the current page

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

smithery_api_key = ""
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@miyuren/mcp-server-browserbase/mcp?api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())
